name: Tranquill
flavorText:
It can return to its Trainer’s location
regardless of the distance
separating them.

previous.name: Pidove
previous.flavorText:
Each follows its Trainer’s orders as
best it can, but they sometimes fail to
understand complicated commands.

next.name: Unfezant
next.flavorText:
Males swing their head plumage to
threaten opponents. The females’ flying
abilities surpass those of the males.
